metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3833 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The getRunningAppProcesses function in services/core/java/com/android/server/am/ActivityManagerService.java in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48I allows attackers to bypass intended getRecentTasks restrictions and discover the name of the foreground application via a crafted application, aka internal bug 20034603.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> need to check if used

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
